content: we do have block / state proof apis in Lodestar similar to what's described in https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/267 which uses a "proof descriptor" instead of path as described in https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3148

author: nflaig
content: There is more rational on why we use proof descriptors instead of paths in this PR https://github.com/ChainSafe/ssz/pull/292
